duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing counseling and therapeutic intervention while supervising juvenile offenders housed in a youth development center.
Utilizing a range of counseling techniques and skills in crisis interventions to effect individual treatment plans and facilitate group interaction processes.
Administering scoring, interpreting assessment tools, and reviewing treatment strategies to achieve rehabilitation goals.
Participating in the development of individual treatment, educational, vocational, and community reintegration programs.
Planning, orchestrating and supervising juvenile movement; monitoring juveniles to maintain safety; and providing behavioral intervention and restraint as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in human services field or related human services field from an appropriately accredited institution and two years of experience working with at-risk youth; or an equivalent combination of education and experience.
